channel.title: Job on Creating Value from Surprise, in a Post Bitcoin World.
channel.description: Recent content in Job on Creating Value from Surprise, in a Post Bitcoin World.

item.title: Let's Get to Work.
item.description: First things first. I have had an account in many of today’s centralized technology services. I have enjoyed, and for a long time I attempted to 140 instagram linkedIn angelList 21.co This is the first post about work. Finding work. Working. Making things that work. Making things that don’t work, work. I recently read The 21st Century Case For Gold: A New Information Theory Of Money by George Gilder and The DAO of Capital: Austrian Investing in a Distorted World by Mark Spitznagel, and I am currently reading Cents and Sensibility.
